Title: All In
Plot: Harvey's personal history with a client forces he and Mike to take on an unorthodox case from which they'd normally walk away. Also, Louis and Rachel team up to save a mutually beloved institution from ruin.
ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language,sexual references and drug use
GuestStars: Scott Grimes, Michael Des Barres, Matthew Glave, Erinn Hayes, Peter Outerbridge, Rachael Crawford
